description: Enumerate ALL acceptance criteria permutations. Apply exhaustive logic decomposition at AC level. Example: Valid input AC, Invalid input AC, Boundary AC, Error AC - cover all paths.

do.description: List all validation paths and calculation branches. Example: When valid rank → calculates modifier; When invalid rank → shows error; When boundary rank → handles edge case

example: When user enters STR rank → system validates (1-20 range)
When user enters invalid rank → system shows error
When user enters valid rank → system calculates modifier

guidance.description: Include happy path, error path, and edge cases
example: Happy: User submits valid form → success
Error: User submits empty form → validation error
Edge: User submits at boundary → handles correctly

dont.description: Don't skip AC permutations. Example: Only 'When user enters rank → system saves' (missing validation and calculation ACs)

example: Only 'When user enters rank → system saves' - MISSING: validation error AC, boundary AC
Only success AC without error handling - MISSING: what happens when validation fails?
Valid and invalid covered but no boundary conditions - MISSING: what happens at limits?
